text: So many of you guys have been asking for this one, so here you go... A whole bucket of churros

self raising flour and a plain flour
ok, and we're going to serve them with a hot chocolate coffee sauce
Super simple!
To start with, both flours - equal quantity of each
we've got our plain flour and our self raising flour
and if you could just mix those together
two table spoons of olive oil

A pinch of salt... Very very few ingredients

what we do need is 400ml of

and it will look really mushy and like wallpaper paste

It should be sticky and stiff

and all we want to do is push this into here

Just push it all in and you'll never

What happens if you haven't got one of these?

so they cook together
